metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3303 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A race condition flaw was found in the Linux kernel sound subsystem due toimproper locking. It could lead to a NULL pointer dereference whilehandling the SNDCTL_DSP_SYNC ioctl. A privileged local user (root or memberof the audio group) could use this flaw to crash the system, resulting in adenial of service condition

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
